pkgmetadata.longdescription: Jack, Zonal, Schur, and Other Symmetric Polynomials // Schur polynomials appear in combinatorics and zonal polynomials appear in random matrix theory. They are particular cases of Jack polynomials. This package allows to compute these polynomials and other symmetric multivariate polynomials: flagged Schur polynomials, factorial Schur polynomials, t-Schur polynomials, Hall-Littlewood polynomials, Macdonald polynomials, and modified Macdonald polynomials. In addition, it can compute the Kostka-Jack numbers, the Kostka-Foulkes polynomials, the Kostka-Macdonald polynomials, and the Hall polynomials. Mainly based on Demmel Koev's paper (2006) doi:10.1090/S0025-5718-05-01780-1 and Macdonald's book (1995) doi:10.1093/oso/9780198534891.003.0001.
